body.name: Steamer For Clothes, Clothes Steamer Handheld, 3 in 1 Handheld Steamer, Hand Steamer For Clothes, Travel Steamer, Portable Steamer, Steamer Iron For Clothes, Hand Steamer 180ml (Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 15 mins
features: Larger Steam Coverage - Featuring a wider head with 13 steam holes, this 800W hand steamer for clothes ensures maximum coverage. Say goodbye to lengthy wrinkle removal sessions, even for your largest clothing items, thanks to this efficient handheld steamer.

Instant Water Level Check - Eliminate guesswork with our visible water level measuring jug. Always know precisely how much water is in the tank. Rest assured, other clothes steamer handheld can't match our quick and easy refill system.

Uninterrupted Steaming with Extended Reach - Equipped with a 180ml water tank, the Home Hero fabric steamer delivers 12 minutes of continuous, deep-penetrating steam. Ideal for quick touch-ups and complete garment wrinkle removal. Plus, the 9ft cord lets you easily iron clothes from a distance.

Ultimate Travel Steamer - Our steamer iron for clothes has a lightweight, portable design with an easy-to-grip D-shaped handle for on-the-go touch-ups. With a quick 2-minute heat-up time, it rapidly dewrinkles fabrics and effortlessly fits into any suitcase or carry-on. Travel in style with wrinkle-free attire!

Bonus Attachments - Our portable steamer includes lint remover and fabric brush attachments for home use. The lint brush, designed to gently clean your while steaming, allows you to clean up beyond clothes and refresh upholstery, drapes, cushions, dog beds, and more. Suitable for various fabrics like polyester, chiffon, silk, wool, cotton, linen, nylon, and more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Revolutionize Your Garment Care The Home Hero Portable Clothes Steamer with Lint Brush and Fabric Brush is a revolutionary solution for wrinkle-free, fresh garments anywhere you go. Experience effortless garment care in one compact package. Disclaimer: Images are genuinely produced using the Home Hero Steamer; they are not edited.

Previous page Continuous Steam Banish Wrinkles Easily Unleash 12 mins of continuous steam with the wide head, 13 steam holes, and 800W powerhouse. Design Forward Complete Garment Care Our fabric and lint brushes ensure a smooth surface, reviving your clothes, upholstery, and more. All-in-One Convenience Versatile Marvel Enjoy versatility with attachments that adapt to various needs for complete garment and home care. Wrinkle-Free on the Go Travel-Friendly Take our compact and lightweight steamer for wrinkle-free elegance wherever you go. Next page 1 Powerful Steam 2 Removes Lint and Wrinkles 3 Multifunctional Gadget 4 Easy To Carry

Easy Grip D-Shaped Handle Our ergonomic handle offers a secure & natural grip, ensuring effortless maneuverability during steaming, making it a pleasure to glide over fabrics. 180ML with Visible Water Level The large 180ml tank provides ample steam time, while the transparent window simplifies water level monitoring, ensuring prompt refills. Measuring Jug Pour water effortlessly into the tank, with our measuring jug ensuring the perfect amount for optimal steaming every time. 9 Ft Cord Enjoy the freedom of movement with our 9ft cord, providing an extended reach for convenient steaming without being tethered to outlet proximity.

Previous page Enjoy A Fur-Free Home Home Hero Pet Hair Remover Tackle fur on furniture, bedding, and car seats with our easy-to-use, reusable pet hair remover. Precise Cooking Made Easy Home Hero Hummingbird Meat Thermometer Get your meals perfectly cooked with our accurate meat thermometer. Up Your Cocktail Game Home Hero Cocktail Smoker Kit Create smoky cocktails easily using our complete home smoker kit with a jigger, stirrer, and more. Organize Your Spice Game Home Hero Spice Rack Effortlessly store and find spices while cooking with our space-saving organizer. Next page 1 Pet Hair Remover Set 2 Hummingbird Thermometer 3 Cocktail Smoker Kit 4 Spice Rack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: very portable and easy to use. It works fast and efficent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: Small handy and it does the job!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for lighter weight fabrics
reviews.reviewText: To test this, I tried this on lightweight curtains as well as some heavy ones.It works ok.The light curtains were new, just out of the package. Wrinkles came out, but creases remained.The heavy weight curtains had been in storage. Some wrinkles came out, others remained.I mean, it's steam. It's going to work adequately.I did find it a bit heavy to use, but that's unavoidable with the water in a hand-held device.It takes a few minutes to get to steamy.It was easy enough to fill. For clothing, one fill would be sufficient. For my testing purposes, it required multiple refills, but I was really giving it a workout.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This steamer warms quickly and gets out even the toughest wrinkles. It’s gentle on all materials (I haven’t had an issue with even pleather and synthetic clothes) and the different attachments are an added bonus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The steamer works great! It’s easy to use - just fill with distilled water, wait a few seconds for steam, and start using. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this Steamer
reviews.reviewText: This clothes steamer heated up so fast and was easy to handle too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Home Hero Steamer
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is amazing. It gets all the wrinkles out in no time. Delivery was excellent especially since I had to return the first one because it had been used. But received a brand new one in less than 24 hours. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love the size and it’s easy to use. Compact yet powerful!
